author: world today news
title: Hamas Accepts Ceasefire Proposal in Gaza Strip from Egypt and Qatar Mediators - Latest Update - World Today News
text: Hamas issued a statement on the 6th, announcing that it agreed with the ceasefire proposal in the Gaza Strip proposed by the mediators. CCTV International News reported that Hamas said it accepted the ceasefire plan proposed by Egypt and Qatar as mediators. The statement said that the head of the Hamas Politburo Haniyeh had spoken to the Prime Minister of Qatar and the head of the Egyptian intelligence agency, saying that Hamas agreed to its cease-fire plan, however, it was not details of the ceasefire plan have yet to be released. [Buidheann Naidheachd Meadhan/Aithisgean farsaing de naidheachdan cèin à Cairo air an 6mh] The war between Israel and the Palestinian armed group Hamas has lasted for almost seven months and Qatar. A Hamas statement read that Hamas political leader Ismail Haniyeh informed Qatar’s Prime Minister and Egypt’s intelligence chief that Hamas accepted their cease-fire proposal. Reuters said Israel had no immediate comment on the matter. BBC News reported that details of Hamas’ acceptance of the ceasefire offer from Egypt and Qatar have not yet been released, including how long the ceasefire will last. and whether the couple was held in the Gaza Strip by Israeli hostages. author: Reuters
title: AFCON 2024: Defending champions Senegal steam into last 16 with 3-1 win over Cameroon - Sportstar
text:
Ismaila Sarr scored one goal and laid on another as defending champions Senegal beat Cameroon 3-1 on Friday and booked their place in the round of 16 at the Africa Cup of Nations, leaving their opponents in some peril.
Sarr opened the scoring in the first half of the Group C clash in Yamoussoukro after a mistake by Manchester United goalkeeper Andre Onana, who was playing his first game of the tournament after a late arrival in the Ivory Coast.
Habib Diallo added the second goal from Sarr’s cross before Jean-Charles Castelletto scored a late consolation for Cameroon. Sadio Mane completed the scoring for Senegal in injury time.
The Lions of Teranga advance to the knockout rounds with a final group game against Guinea to spare. Cameroon must play Gambia in their last match. Both of those are on Tuesday.
Voting lines now open for Sportstar ACES Awards 2024
Senegal head the pool with six points from their two games, while Cameroon and Guinea have a point each and Gambia are yet to break their duck. The latter two sides meet at the same venue later on Friday.
Cameroon barely tested Senegal keeper Edouard Mendy until the final 10 minutes when they could have earned a point after a limp performance that followed a 1-1 draw with Guinea in their opener -- alarming form for coach Rigobert Song.
He selected Onana after the keeper missed the Guinea game in order to play for Manchester United against Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League, and will be frustrated by the manner of the first goal conceded.
Sarr netted on 16 minutes after Onana attempted to punch clear a cross but did not get the height or distance he needed and the ball fell to the winger, whose deflected shot went into the bottom corner.
Sarr then turned provider when he was left in acres of space on the right-hand side of the box and his low cross was turned home from four yards by Diallo.
That goal seemed to spark Cameroon into life and they found a way back into the contest with a goal from a corner as Castelletto headed in Olivier Ntcham’s cross.
It should have been 2-2 following a horrific miss at the back post from Georges-Kevin Nkoudou, who headed wide with the goalmouth gaping.
Senegal went up the other end and sealed the three points when Mane netted their third goal.

author: Kevin Lee
title: Best Standing Desks in 2023 - IGN
text:
A solid desk is essential to every workspace or PC battle station, but to take your setup to greater heights—and enjoy few health benefits—a standing desk is the way to go. The FlexiSpot Pro Plus Standing Desk E7 , our top choice, lets you raise or lower your gear with just the push of a button for a moderate price, and we’ve found other quality options that range in price, size, and functionality.
Click to jump to a detailed look at the best standing desks , or check the list below:
TL;DR – These are the Best Standing Desks: FlexiSpot Pro Plus Standing Desk E7 Autonomous SmartDesk Core FlexiSpot Standard Standing Desk E2 Autonomous SmartDesk Corner Secretlab Magnus Pro Uplift V2 4-Leg Standing Desk ApexDesk Pneumatic Stand Desk VIVO 32-inch Desk Converter Xdesk Flex EvoDesk Pro Aviator The best standing desks let you dial in the perfect ergonomics for your setup, whether your behind is in one of the best gaming chairs or you’re looking to stretch your limbs and get the blood flowing while fully vertical. Some options come with multiple motors, premium materials, and a heavy max load to take on beefy PC battle stations, while others tone down features for a simple way to bring your gear higher.
So, no matter what you need, we’ve selected ten great standing desks ready to rise up to the challenge – and find them in the UK .
Best Standing Desks 1. FlexiSpot Pro Plus Standing Desk E7 Best Standing Desk FlexiSpot Pro Plus Standing Desk E7 The E7 is built with thicker leg columns and the column gap is scientifically designed to be 0.05 mm, which is the optimal setting for the stages of columns to move smoothly.

author: Oliver Schwuchow
title: Apple: Das neue iPad mini bekommt wieder keinen M-Chip
text:
Apple: Das neue iPad mini bekommt wieder keinen M-Chip
Apple plant ein neues iPad mini, welches aber vermutlich erst 2026 auf dem Plan steht und erstmals ein OLED-Display mitbringen wird. Aaron Perris hat das neue iPad jetzt im Code von Apple entdeckt und Details zum neuen Chip erfahren.
Sollte seine Analyse des Codes stimmen, dann wird Apple im neuen iPad mini, das den Codenamen J510/J511 trägt, einen Apple A19 Pro nutzen. Das ist der Chip für das kommende Apple iPhone 17 Pro, welches wir im September sehen werden.
Apple verzichtet also im kleinen iPad weiterhin auf einen M-Chip, wie man ihn im iPad Air oder iPad Pro findet, das aktuelle iPad mini nutzt den Apple A17 Pro. Doch ein Apple A19 Pro sollte den meisten Nutzern mit Blick auf die Leistung ausreichen.
-->Fehler melden1 Kommentar
-
Ich sehe auch keinen Grund dazu. Das ist nun einmal eine im Verhältnis günstige Serie, und die Bildschirmgröße ist auch deutlich kleiner als beim iPad ohne Zusatz. Wer sich für ein iPad Mini entscheidet, dürfte damit von der Leistung absolut zufrieden sein. Wer mehr will, greift zu einem Pro-Modell. Zumal ja auch ein MacBook mit A-Chip geplant ist, um dort eine günstigere Variante zu ermöglichen, was ein weiteres Argument dagegen ist, beim iPad von dieser Strategie abzukehren.
